text:
Their Conventional foam audit was already performed. TUVR is holding those samples until they are ready to begin the testing process. Hopefully that will be fairly soon.
Just a reminder, the certificate extension is a temporary measure that only holds until the audit test results are complete. If their test passes, the renewal of their foam will begin from the time it was already due - 5/7/2024. (The Invoice will be from 5/7/2024 - 5/7/2025.)
trans:
기존 폼 품질 검사는 이미 실시되었습니다. 검사를 실시할 준비가 될 때까지 TUVR가 샘플을 보관합니다. 곧 이루어지길 바랍니다.
참고로, 인증 연장은 품질 검사 결과가 끝날 때까지만 유효한 임시 방편입니다. 검사를 통과하면, 폼 갱신은 원래 예정된 2024.5.7.에 시작될 것입니다. (송장은 2024.5.7. - 2025.5.7 입니다.)
